name: rentacloud
description: Rentacloud - Ijara Boshqaruv Tizimi. Asbob-uskunalarni ijaraga berish va daromadni hisoblash uchun zamonaviy web aplikatsiya.

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.build: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend && npm run build --prefix frontend
scripts.install-all: npm install && npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.clean: npm run clean --prefix frontend && npm run clean --prefix backend

author: ProX Development Team <support@rentacloud.uz>
